segments.text: I'm watching this unfold, and I just want to yell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out of that sink like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a huge mess already, and it's only getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is completely submerged, how can she not feel it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her lack of awareness is truly baffling me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And look at that boy, he's going to fall right off that stool!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is practically encouraging him with her open hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to slip on that wet floor, I guarantee it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The idea of shattered dishes and injured children makes me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to the obvious hazards?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a slow-motion disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of pure irritation watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is rapidly becoming a water park, and not a fun one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The broken social rule of stealing cookies is almost secondary to the physical risks.
segments.speaker: PAR
